## Activities

- {{< iconify fa6-solid diagram-project size=18px >}} **Monday**: Laboratory session
- {{< iconify fa6-solid people-line size=18px >}} **Tuesday and Thursday**: Malware
  - Understand the types of malware
  - Learn how to detect and defend against malware
  - Discover the indicators of compromise
  - Continued highlighting of the concept of a "security synapse"
  - Student presentations that feature:
    - Explanation of a high-level concept in the area of malware
    - In-class activity that connects concepts to real-world scenarios
    - Implementation of a malware-adjacent concept in a programming language
    - Question and answer session with learning peers and the course instructor
